summary: This document contains multiple entries of Fedwire credit advice transactions involving Gratitude America, Ltd. The transactions detail various amounts credited to Gratitude America, with references to banks involved and the nature of the transactions. The document highlights significant financial movements associated with Gratitude America, including large sums transferred from different banks.

keyFacts: Multiple transactions involving Gratitude America, Ltd. are documented, indicating significant financial activity.
Paul Barrett is identified as an originator in several transactions.
The largest transaction recorded is a credit of $7,112,268.98 on July 24, 2019.
The document includes transactions with Deutsche Bank and Morgan Stanley Smith Barney.
Several amounts were credited to Gratitude America, Ltd. with no charge amounts indicated.
